features: H13 True HEPA Air Purifier - With 3-stage filtration system: pre-filter, H13 true HEPA filter, and high-efficiency activated carbon filter. Capturing fine particles like dust, pet dander, smoke, and house odor. Suitable for living room, bedroom, kitchen, office, baby room, basement, car, hotel, desktop, etc. perfectly solve air quality problems in small areas such as pet room, and office desktop

Efficient and One-button Operating - This small air purifier for desktop office room features multidirectional air intake and a powerful motor, which can clean up to 269 ft² in 45 minutes. It takes one single press of the same button to turn it on/off and control the fan speed（3 Fan Speeds）

USB Powered, Compact and Portable - Convenient USB power option allows you to purify the air around you effortlessly, whether at home or on the go. Seamlessly into small spaces, providing powerful air purification wherever your travel, driving, office and bedroom
Whisper-Quiet Operation - Only 20dB ensures a peaceful and undisturbed environment for sleeping, working, or relaxing. Enjoy the benefits of efficient purification with a virtually silent operation
What You Get - a portable air purifier, 3-in-1 filter, DC to USB charging cable (the plug is not included), and a instruction manual. 12 months warranty and 24 hours technology support are provided

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Here are some warm tips for using a mini air purifier: Placement Matters: Position your mini air purifier in a strategic location within the room, such as near your bed, desk, or in areas with higher air circulation for optimal effectiveness. Regular Filter Replacement: Check and replace filters as recommended by the manufacturer. This ensures that the air purifier continues to function at its best and maintains efficient air purification. Keep it Clean: Regularly clean the exterior of the air purifier to prevent dust buildup, which can affect its performance. A clean unit operates more efficiently. Allow for Air Circulation: Ensure proper air circulation in the room. Avoid placing the mini air purifier in areas obstructed by furniture or curtains, as this can limit its ability to purify the air effectively.

Efficiency Filtration Uses 3 layers of filters, pre-treatment filter + activated carbon filter + real hepa filter. Effectively captures 99.97% of air particles, including smoke, dust, odors, pet dander, and more... 3 Fan Speeds Fan low speed: press the button once to enter low noise sleep mode； Medium-speed fan: press the button twice；High fan speed: press the button 3 times to turn on maximum power purification One-button Control One-button Control, easy to operate.

reviews.reviewerName: Allen E Crews JrAllen E Crews Jr
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and light.
reviews.reviewText: It's a fairly small air purifier, it's just over 8 in tall 5 in wide and 5 in deep. Has a single button on the front, you have three different speeds to choose from. You do need to take the filter out before you start it up, the filters wrapped in plastic. And you will need an input for a USB-A connection. As far as it being quiet, it is fairly quiet but not as quiet as they say it is. If I remember right I think they said it's about 22 decibels, which is absurd, because a quiet room is about 45 decibels. But even on high it's not very loud, I normally sleep with a fan on anyway so I like the noise. But it is pretty quiet. I just don't know what you're supposed to do with it once the filter gets bad. There does not seem to be a replacement filter for it anywhere. The filter itself is 5 in by 4 and 1/2 in by inch and 3/8. I guess considering the price once the filter plugs up you just throw it out and buy another? And it's also very light, it's just over 1 lb so it's quite easy to move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and portable, easy to travel with
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this HEPA air filter is amazing! It not only filters the air in my room properly and efficiently, but it is also competitively priced and economical. Since I started using it, there has been a noticeable drop in dust, allergies, and diseases. Knowing that the air I breathe is significantly cleaner and healthier provides me a great deal of peace. I wholeheartedly suggest this air filter to anyone searching for a cost-effective way to raise the quality of the air indoors. It is unquestionably worth every dollar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The unit is decent priced. It is not too loud. Seems to clean the air. There is a filter, but nothing about a replacement or how to maintain it. I like the price at $20.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Compact USB Only
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is compact and works well. Few things I wish were included: instruction on which way the filter should go in (not included on instructions nor the site) two different sides not sure which should go up or down, where to order replacement filters, and lastly a wall plug option not just USB option. I would have given 4 stars but since unsure if beyond the one filter use I will be able to use any longer since no replacement filter included nor where to order more filters plus unsure if I even have the filter in correctly due to lack of instructions on the instruction sheet. The air purifier works from what I can tell and sound is minimal. Great for a small space or near desk at work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice air purifier, pretty quiet
reviews.reviewText: This is a neat little air purifier that is the perfect size for a desk or nightstand. It works on a USB cable, making it easy to plug it instead of a phone charger. With one button, there's nothing to setup or fuss with, and it operates pretty quietly. You can barely notice it if you have another machine or PC running. It's hard to judge how much it cleans, but it must, and with air quality these days, getting some help with cleaner air helps peace of mind a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good office cleaner
reviews.reviewText: Good to have at a desk plugged in. Small and quiet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent air filter for a very small space. We put it in our small half bath. It was easy to set up, you just take the bag off the filter and replace it in the unit and then plug it in, you're good to go. There are 3 settings for how much air you want it to move. It does seem to clear the air well. Overall, it works well.
